project1.title: Toll Booth Dispatcher Workstation
project1.location: Eastern Exit from Ufa to M-5 "Ural" Highway
project1.description: Dispatcher workstation for toll booth operations. Real-time equipment monitoring (barriers, traffic lights, cameras), managing promotions and toll pricing.
project1.highlights: REST API for initial state, WebSocket (StompJS) for real-time updates, form validation via React-Hook-Form

project2.title: Contactless Toll Point Dispatcher Workstation
project2.location: Vitebskaya Junction of Western High-Speed Diameter
project2.description: Monitoring system for contactless toll points. Real-time passage display, transaction merging with camera photos and transponder data.
project2.highlights: WebSocket via Socket.io for real-time passages, transaction merging via REST API

project3.title: ATMS Dispatcher Workstation
project3.location: Vitebskaya Junction of Western High-Speed Diameter
project3.description: Automated Traffic Management System. Interactive map with equipment visualization via Canvas API.
project3.highlights: Improved LCP by 120%, INP by 135%. Canvas optimization, state caching, redraw throttling

project4.title: BugBounty.ru Platform
project4.description: Landing page on Next.js and admin panel for bug hunters and companies. Full development cycle: desktop and mobile versions, error handling, modals, Markdown support.
project4.highlights: Next.js + TypeScript (landing), React + Redux Toolkit (admin panel), form validation via React-Hook-Form, security hardening, optimization with useMemo/memo/useCallback
